nonaggressive adjective
(disease)
A nonaggressive disease, especially cancer, does not spread quickly and has a good chance of being cured: She was diagnosed with nonaggressive skin cancer. We are trying to develop a protocol to identify non-aggressive prostate cancers.
More examplesFewer examplesTwo-thirds of sufferers get the non-aggressive variety of the disease, which has a high survival rate.It can be difficult to distinguish aggressive from non-aggressive cancers.
